mapper.sql: o.mark_id, o.order_no, o.product_id, o.product_type, o.group_id, o.user_id, o.product_name, o.specification_ids, o.quantity, o.order_amount, o.delivery_amount, o.pay_amount, o.order_time, o.cancel_time, o.delivery_date, o.arrive_time, o.order_source, o.sort, o.order_status, o.storehouse_id
mapper.select: select , (SELECT u.nick_name FROM db_user.t_user_info u WHERE u.mark_id=o.user_id) AS nickName, (SELECT a.`name` FROM db_base.t_attribute_info a WHERE a.`code`=o.order_status) AS statusDesc, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(attr_name, ':', attr_value) SEPARATOR ';') FROM db_goods.t_specification_info WHERE FIND_IN_SET(mark_id, o.specification_ids)) AS specs, (SELECT g.theme FROM t_teambuy_group g WHERE g.mark_id=o.group_id) AS theme, (SELECT g.server_status FROM t_teambuy_group g WHERE g.mark_id=o.group_id) AS teamStatus, (SELECT g.group_no FROM t_teambuy_group g WHERE g.mark_id=o.group_id) AS groupNo from t_teambuy_order o where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_teambuy_order (mark_id, order_no, product_id, product_type, group_id, user_id, product_name, specification_ids, quantity, order_amount, delivery_amount, pay_amount, order_time, cancel_time, delivery_date, arrive_time, order_source, sort, order_status, storehouse_id) values (#{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificationIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_teambuy_order
mark_id,
order_no,
product_id,
product_type,
group_id,
user_id,
product_name,
specification_ids,
quantity,
order_amount,
delivery_amount,
pay_amount,

delivery_date,
arrive_time,
order_source,
sort,
order_status,
storehouse_id,

mapper.update:
update t_teambuy_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specification_ids = #{specificationIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
delivery_amount = #{deliveryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cancel_time = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_source = #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storehouse_id = #{storehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_teambuy_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification_ids = #{specificationIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delivery_amount = #{deliveryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_time = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_source = #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storehouse_id = #{storehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SElECT , (SELECT u.nick_name FROM db_user.t_user_info u WHERE u.mark_id=o.user_id) AS nickName, (SELECT a.`name` FROM db_base.t_attribute_info a WHERE a.`code`=o.order_status) AS statusDesc, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(attr_name, ':', attr_value) SEPARATOR ';') FROM db_goods.t_specification_info WHERE FIND_IN_SET(mark_id, o.specification_ids)) AS specs FROM t_teambuy_order o WHERE o.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT (CASE WHEN o.product_type=0 THEN (SELECT g.image_path FROM db_goods.t_goods_image g WHERE g.goods_id=o.product_id AND g.server_type=0 LIMIT 1) WHEN o.product_type=1 THEN (SELECT g.image_path FROM db_goods.t_goods_voucher c LEFT JOIN db_goods.t_goods_image g ON c.product_id=g.goods_id WHERE c.product_id=o.product_id AND g.server_type=0 LIMIT 1) WHEN o.product_type=2 THEN (SELECT m.image_path FROM db_goods.t_meal_image m WHERE m.meal_id=o.product_id AND m.server_type=0 LIMIT 1) WHEN o.product_type=3 THEN (SELECT a.image_path FROM db_goods.t_accessory_info a WHERE a.mark_id=o.product_id) END) AS image_path FROM t_teambuy_order o WHERE o.mark_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
